name: I Am Not a Werewolf ☑
description:
It is recommended that you play in fullscreen mode when playing the WebGL version. Use P to open and close the menu for WebGL

Well done with your interview. There is a slight issue however: there are 18 hour work days which can go past midnight. As you suffer from lycanthropy, this is a major detriment to your timetable. Make sure that you can avoid killing your fellow colleagues, otherwise you may lose your hard earned role.
